body_html: On my installation, nvidia-docker still works. I think to reduce confusion, we should stick with nvidia-docker, and think of this switch later down the line where we have a higher adoption rate for nvidia-docker2
body_text: On my installation, nvidia-docker still works. I think to reduce confusion, we should stick with nvidia-docker, and think of this switch later down the line where we have a higher adoption rate for nvidia-docker2
body: On my installation, `nvidia-docker` still works. I think to reduce confusion, we should stick with `nvidia-docker`, and think of this switch later down the line where we have a higher adoption rate for nvidia-docker2
